name.baseName: Electricity/electrical energy + heat energy ; Coal ; Circulating fluidized bed boiler ; 450~749 MW; NESPS2
电能/电能+热能 ; 煤炭 ; 循环流化床锅炉 ; 450～749兆瓦 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该450～749兆瓦煤炭循环流化床锅炉产生的电能和热能适用于大规模电力和热力生产操作，能够为住宅、商业或工业设施提供综合供应。高效电袋复合除尘器用作尾端污染控制技术，以从排放中去除微粒物质（PM2.5 - PM10），适用于有严格排放标准的燃煤电厂。协同汞去除技术用于减少烟气中的汞污染。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4411、4412文件，在完整版文件中第5275页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundis/
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物
源文件中描述为为煤炭，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisOthers (direct discharge)
污染物指标氮氧化物（10%小于煤炭干燥无灰基挥发分小于等于20%）的末端治理技术是其他（直排）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物（10%小于煤炭干燥无灰基挥发分小于等于20%），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物（10%小于煤炭干燥无灰基挥发分小于等于20%）
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisOthers (direct discharge)
污染物指标氮氧化物（20%小于煤炭干燥无灰基挥发分小于等于37%）的末端治理技术是其他（直排）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物（20%小于煤炭干燥无灰基挥发分小于等于37%），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物（20%小于煤炭干燥无灰基挥发分小于等于37%）

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution mercuryisSynergistic mercury removal，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management25.73MHgar+84.12.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.000995MHgar。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.000995MHgar. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.

污染物指标汞及其化合物的末端治理技术是协同脱汞，其效率为25.73MHgar+84.12，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为取该机组除尘、脱硝脱硫K的最小值。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为汞及其化合物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为汞及其化合物原文描述的产污系数为 0.000995MHgar。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isElectric-bag composite precipitator，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0.0045Aar+0.027Sar+99.7.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 5Aar+26.98Sar+7。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 5Aar+26.98Sar+7. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.

污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是电袋组合，其效率为0.0045Aar+0.027Sar+99.7，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为除尘设施年实际运行小时数/机组年实际运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物原文描述的产污系数为 5Aar+26.98Sar+7。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isHigh-efficiency electric-bag composite precipitator①，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0.0015Aar+0.009Sar+99.9.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 5Aar+26.98Sar+7。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 5Aar+26.98Sar+7. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.

污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是高效电袋组合①，其效率为0.0015Aar+0.009Sar+99.9，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为除尘设施年实际运行小时数/机组年实际运行小时数，①高效颗粒物末端治理技术：采取高效电源供电、低低温电除尘、超净电袋、高效袋式除尘、湿法脱硫协同、湿式电除尘等技术，满足《燃煤电厂超低排放烟气 治理工程技术规范》（HJ2053-2034）相关要求。 。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物原文描述的产污系数为 5Aar+26.98Sar+7。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.56Sar。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.56Sar. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
污染物指标二氧化硫（炉内脱硫）的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫（炉内脱硫），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫（炉内脱硫）原文描述的产污系数为 0.56Sar。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
